scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && webpack --config ./webpack.config.js && cd dist && web-ext run
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && webpack --config ./webpack.config.js && cd dist && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && webpack --config ./webpack.config.js && cd dist && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
